quizDescription: Test your knowledge of pop culture highlights from the 1980s!
quizTags: Pop Culture, 1980s, Eighties, Music, Movies, Fashion

questions.question: Which science fiction film, released in 1982, directed by Ridley Scott, and starring Harrison Ford, is set in a dystopian future and has become a cult classic?
options: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
questions.explanation: 'Blade Runner' is a sci-fi noir film set in a futuristic Los Angeles and has gained a dedicated following over the years.

questions.question: Which pop icon, often referred to as the 'King of Pop,' released his best-selling album 'Thriller' in 1982?
questions.explanation: Michael Jackson's 'Thriller' became one of the best-selling albums of all time and had a significant impact on the music industry.

questions.question: Which beloved fantasy film, released in 1987, directed by Rob Reiner, follows the story of a young boy and his adventures in a magical kingdom?
questions.explanation: 'The Princess Bride' is a charming and witty film that has become a cult classic, delighting audiences of all ages.

questions.question: Which iconic dance film, released in 1987, starred Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey and became a box office hit?
questions.explanation: 'Dirty Dancing' captured the hearts of audiences with its passionate dance sequences and memorable soundtrack.

questions.question: Which popular fashion trend of the 1980s featured oversized tops, leggings, and bold colors?
questions.explanation: 80s Aerobics Fashion was a fitness-inspired trend characterized by vibrant colors, leg warmers, and high-cut leotards.
